name: WhatsApp Sidebar Minimizer
description: NOTE: Shifted to userstyles.world which supports UserCSS to change variables on the go. ---------------------------------------------------------------------- A fix of the theme https://userstyles.org/styles/126775/whatsapp-interactive-chat-list-fullscreen which makes it so that your sidebar minimizes automatically and expands on hover, giving your chat more space.
